video_prompt: Aerial view over futuristic city: flying vehicles glide, billboard emits shifting light bursts, glowing skyscraper screens display abstract patterns, city lights twinkle. Sunset colors dynamically shift across the sky.
image_prompt: **High-angle aerial view of a futuristic city at sunset.** Densely packed skyscrapers with glowing screens. A prominent rectangular billboard emits a vibrant blue, white, and purple starburst. Sleek, dark flying vehicles with blue and turquoise accents in the sky. Rich color palette of deep blues, purples, pinks, oranges, and yellows. Vast cityscape extending into the distance with visible road systems and light trails. Subtle digital "C29" logo in the bottom right corner.
refined_video_prompt: Flying vehicles gracefully glide. Billboards emit shifting light bursts. Glowing skyscraper screens display evolving abstract patterns. City lights subtly twinkle and pulsate. Sunset colors dynamically transition across the sky.
